data.actual_result: Discord invalidates READY payload as incorrect and starts re-connection cycle
data.expected_result: Discord ignores an invalid presence and ready to use
data.short_description: Someone's invalid presence may cause reconnection cycle to other users
data.steps_to_repro: - Somewhere on random server member has an invalid presence - (invalid timestamp format in my case) - You open up Discord - It starts connection and soon receives READY payload that contains this invalid presence
